name: API Package.json
content:
{
  "name": "fleet-api",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Fleet Management System - Backend API",
  "main": "dist/server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "dotenv -e .env -- tsx watch --tsconfig tsconfig.json src/server-simple.ts",
    "dev:full": "dotenv -e .env -- tsx watch --tsconfig tsconfig.json src/server.ts",
    "build": "tsc --project tsconfig.build.json",
    "build:strict": "tsc",
    "start": "node dist/server-simple.js",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:watch": "vitest --watch",
    "test:coverage": "vitest --coverage",
    "test:integration": "vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.ts",
    "test:integration:watch": "vitest --config vitest.integration.config.ts",
    "test:integration:coverage": "vitest --coverage --config vitest.integration.config.ts",
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.ts\"",
    "seed": "dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/db/seeds/seed-orchestrator.ts",
    "seed:reset": "dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/db/seeds/seed-orchestrator.ts reset",
    "seed:old": "tsx src/scripts/seed-production-data.ts",
    "seed:old2": "tsx src/scripts/seed-comprehensive-test-data.ts",
    "seed:verify": "tsx src/scripts/verify-seed-data.ts",
    "analyze:coverage": "tsx src/scripts/analyze-coverage-gaps.ts",
    "seed:edge-cases": "tsx src/scripts/seed-edge-cases.ts",
    "verify:coverage": "npm run analyze:coverage",
    "coverage:full": "npm run analyze:coverage && npm run seed:edge-cases && npm run analyze:coverage",
    "setup:webhooks": "tsx src/scripts/setup-webhooks.ts",
    "verify:integration": "tsx src/scripts/verify-integration.ts",
    "webhooks:cleanup": "tsx src/scripts/cleanup-webhooks.ts",
    "build:prod": "find src -name \"*.ts\" ! -name \"*.test.ts\" ! -path \"*/__tests__/*\" ! -path \"*/tests/*\" | xargs npx esbuild --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outdir=dist --log-level=error",
    "migrate": "tsx src/scripts/run-migrations.ts",
    "migrate:generate": "drizzle-kit generate",
    "migrate:push": "drizzle-kit push",
    "db:studio": "drizzle-kit studio",
    "db:reset": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts reset",
    "db:reset:fast": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts reset:fast",
    "db:snapshot": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts snapshot",
    "db:restore": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts restore",
    "db:snapshots": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts snapshots",
    "db:cleanup": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts cleanup",
    "db:stats": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts stats",
    "db:benchmark": "tsx src/db/reset/cli-simple.ts benchmark",
    "db:seed": "npm run db:reset && npm run seed",
    "test:e2e:setup": "npm run db:reset && npm run db:snapshot e2e-baseline",
    "check:memory": "node --expose-gc --inspect src/scripts/check-memory.js",
    "setup": "./setup-and-test.sh",
    "check:db": "tsx -e 'import {checkDatabaseConnection} from \"./src/db/connection\"; checkDatabaseConnection().then(r => process.exit(r ? 0 : 1))'"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@anthropic-ai/sdk": "^0.20.0",
    "@aws-sdk/client-s3": "^3.937.0",
    "@aws-sdk/client-textract": "^3.936.0",
    "@aws-sdk/s3-request-presigner": "^3.937.0",
    "@azure/cognitiveservices-computervision": "^8.2.0",
    "@azure/cosmos": "^4.0.0",
    "@azure/identity": "^4.13.0",
    "@azure/keyvault-secrets": "^4.10.0",
    "@azure/monitor-opentelemetry-exporter": "^1.0.0-beta.35",
    "@azure/ms-rest-js": "^2.7.0",
    "@azure/openai": "^1.0.0-beta.8",
    "@azure/search-documents": "^12.2.0",
    "@azure/service-bus": "^7.9.5",
    "@azure/storage-blob": "^12.18.0",
    "@azure/web-pubsub": "^1.1.2",
    "@faker-js/faker": "^10.1.0",
    "@fastify/busboy": "^3.0.0",
    "@google-cloud/vision": "^5.3.4",
    "@langchain/community": "^1.0.0",
    "@langchain/core": "^1.0.0",
    "@langchain/openai": "^1.0.0",
    "@microsoft/microsoft-graph-client": "^3.0.7",
    "@modelcontextprotocol/sdk": "^1.0.4",
    "@opentelemetry/api": "^1.9.0",
    "@opentelemetry/auto-instrumentations-node": "^0.67.2",
    "@opentelemetry/exporter-trace-otlp-http": "^0.208.0",
    "@opentelemetry/resources": "^2.2.0",
    "@opentelemetry/sdk-node": "^0.208.0",
    "@opentelemetry/semantic-conventions": "^1.38.0",
    "@parse/node-apn": "^7.0.1",
    "@sentry/integrations": "^7.114.0",
    "@sentry/node": "^10.27.0",
    "@sentry/profiling-node": "^10.27.0",
    "@types/argon2": "^0.14.1",
    "@types/cookie-parser": "^1.4.10",
    "@types/dompurify": "^3.0.5",
    "@types/inversify": "^2.0.32",
    "@types/ioredis": "^4.28.10",
    "@types/jsdom": "^27.0.0",
    "@types/multer": "^2.0.0",
    "@types/node-cron": "^3.0.11",
    "@types/nodemailer": "^7.0.3",
    "@types/pg": "^8.15.6",
    "@types/qrcode": "^1.5.6",
    "@types/reflect-metadata": "^0.0.5",
    "@types/speakeasy": "^2.0.10",
    "@types/swagger-jsdoc": "^6.0.4",
    "@types/swagger-ui-express": "^4.1.8",
    "applicationinsights": "^3.12.0",
    "argon2": "^0.44.0",
    "awilix": "^12.0.5",
    "axios": "^1.13.2",
    "bcrypt": "^5.1.1",
    "bottleneck": "^2.19.5",
    "bull": "^4.16.5",
    "bullmq": "^5.66.5",
    "cookie-parser": "^1.4.7",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "csrf-csrf": "^4.0.3",
    "csurf": "^1.11.0",
    "dd-trace": "^5.26.0",
    "dompurify": "^3.3.1",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.1",
    "drizzle-kit": "^0.18.1",
    "drizzle-orm": "^0.44.7",
    "exceljs": "^4.4.0",
    "exif-parser": "^0.1.12",
    "exifreader": "^4.23.3",
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "express-prometheus-middleware": "^1.2.0",
    "express-rate-limit": "^7.5.1",
    "express-validator": "^7.3.1",
    "file-type": "^16.5.4",
    "firebase-admin": "^13.6.0",
    "google-auth-library": "^9.14.0",
    "googleapis": "^140.0.1",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "ics": "^3.8.1",
    "inversify": "^7.10.5",
    "ioredis": "^5.8.2",
    "isomorphic-dompurify": "^2.35.0",
    "isomorphic-fetch": "^3.0.0",
    "js-yaml": "^4.1.0",
    "jsdom": "^27.4.0",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    "jwks-rsa": "^3.2.0",
    "langchain": "^0.3.5",
    "mammoth": "^1.11.0",
    "microsoft-cognitiveservices-speech-sdk": "^1.34.1",
    "multer": "^2.0.2",
    "node-cron": "^4.2.1",
    "nodemailer": "^7.0.10",
    "openai": "^4.28.0",
    "ora": "^9.0.0",
    "otplib": "^12.0.1",
    "pdf-parse": "^1.1.4",
    "pg": "^8.16.3",
    "pg-boss": "^12.2.0",
    "pgvector": "^0.2.1",
    "piexifjs": "^1.0.6",
    "prom-client": "^15.1.3",
    "qrcode": "^1.5.4",
    "redis": "^5.10.0",
    "reflect-metadata": "^0.2.2",
    "sharp": "^0.33.0",
    "socket.io": "^4.8.1",
    "speakeasy": "^2.0.0",
    "swagger-jsdoc": "^6.2.8",
    "swagger-ui-express": "^5.0.1",
    "tesseract.js": "^5.1.1",
    "three": "^0.181.1",
    "twilio": "^5.3.5",
    "uuid": "^9.0.1",
    "winston": "^3.11.0",
    "winston-daily-rotate-file": "^5.0.0",
    "ws": "^8.16.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^6.9.1",
    "@testing-library/react": "^16.3.0",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^14.6.1",
    "@types/bcrypt": "^5.0.2",
    "@types/better-sqlite3": "^7.6.13",
    "@types/bull": "^3.15.9",
    "@types/cors": "^2.8.17",
    "@types/express": "^4.17.21",
    "@types/express-session": "^1.18.2",
    "@types/jest": "^30.0.0",
    "@types/json2csv": "^5.0.7",
    "@types/jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.5",
    "@types/node": "^20.10.6",
    "@types/passport": "^1.0.17",
    "@types/pdf-parse": "^1.1.5",
    "@types/pdfkit": "^0.17.4",
    "@types/sharp": "^0.32.0",
    "@types/socket.io": "^3.0.1",
    "@types/supertest": "^6.0.3",
    "@types/three": "^0.181.0",
    "@types/uuid": "^10.0.0",
    "@types/ws": "^8.5.10",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.48.1",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin-tslint": "^7.0.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.48.1",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^4.0.16",
    "@vitest/ui": "^4.0.15",
    "dotenv-cli": "^11.0.0",
    "esbuild": "^0.27.2",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "eslint-import-resolver-typescript": "^4.4.4",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.32.0",
    "eslint-plugin-no-secrets": "^2.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^11.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^7.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-security": "^3.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-unused-imports": "^4.3.0",
    "graphql": "^16.12.0",
    "graphql-redis-subscriptions": "^2.7.0",
    "graphql-scalars": "^1.25.0",
    "graphql-subscriptions": "^3.0.0",
    "jest": "^30.2.0",
    "json2csv": "^6.0.0-alpha.2",
    "pdf-lib": "^1.17.1",
    "pdfkit": "^0.17.2",
    "prettier": "^3.1.1",
    "supertest": "^6.3.4",
    "ts-jest": "^29.4.6",
    "ts-morph": "^27.0.2",
    "tsx": "^4.21.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "vitest": "^4.0.16",
    "zod": "^4.1.13"
  }
}
